hero.subtitle: Architecting resilient, petabyte-scale streaming data platforms and cloud infrastructure
hero.bio: I transform complex data challenges into reliable production systems. With 10+ years of deep expertise in <1>Apache Kafka</1>, <3>Kubernetes</3>, and <5>AWS</5>, I help organizations build fault-tolerant architectures that scale.

services.title: Services
services.description: Comprehensive engineering solutions for building and scaling modern data platforms, cloud infrastructure, and distributed systems

data.title: Data Platform & Streaming Engineering
data.description: End-to-end design and implementation of modern data platforms built for scale, reliability, and real-time processing.
data.details: I architect and build production-grade data platforms that process millions of events per second, ensuring data consistency, fault tolerance, and exactly-once semantics. From data ingestion to analytics-ready outputs, I design systems that power business-critical decisions.
features: Real-time streaming architectures using Apache Kafka and AWS MSK
Event-driven microservices with exactly-once processing guarantees
Data reconciliation systems ensuring consistency across distributed systems
ETL/ELT pipelines for batch and streaming workloads
Schema evolution and data quality frameworks
Analytics-ready data lakes and warehouses

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps
cloud.description: Production-ready cloud infrastructure on AWS and Kubernetes, automated with Infrastructure as Code and CI/CD best practices.
cloud.details: I build secure, scalable, and cost-efficient cloud infrastructure that supports high-availability requirements. Using modern DevOps practices, I create automated deployment pipelines that enable rapid, reliable releases while maintaining system stability and observability.
features: Kubernetes cluster design and management (EKS, self-managed)
Infrastructure as Code using Terraform and Terragrunt
CI/CD pipelines with GitOps workflows (ArgoCD, Tekton)
Container orchestration and microservices deployment
Monitoring, logging, and alerting with comprehensive observability
Cost optimization and resource management strategies

backend.title: Backend & API Engineering
backend.description: High-performance backend systems and APIs built with modern architectures, designed for scale, maintainability, and developer experience.
backend.details: I develop robust backend services using Java, Golang, Python, and Node.js, applying microservices patterns, clean architecture principles, and API design best practices. My focus is on building systems that are both performant under load and easy to maintain and extend.
features: RESTful and GraphQL API design and implementation
Microservices architecture with proper domain boundaries
High-performance services handling millions of requests per day
Database optimization and caching strategies (Redis, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
Authentication, authorization, and security best practices
Comprehensive testing strategies (unit, integration, E2E)

consulting.title: Technical Consulting & Architecture
consulting.description: Senior-level technical guidance for organizations building or scaling complex distributed systems and data platforms.
consulting.details: I provide strategic technical consulting to help teams make informed architectural decisions, avoid common pitfalls, and establish engineering best practices. Whether you need an architecture review, migration strategy, or hands-on guidance, I bring 10+ years of production experience.
features: Architecture reviews and system design consultations
Data strategy and streaming architecture design
Legacy system migration planning and execution
Technology selection and stack recommendations
Team mentoring and engineering best practices
Performance optimization and troubleshooting

stats.experience: <0>10+ years</0> of production experience building and scaling systems that process <2>billions of events</2> and serve <4>millions of users</4>

oracle.desc: Enterprise RDBMS, stored procedures, complex transactions, legacy system integration
